name: Power & Revolution 2019 Edition
description: The new evolution of Geopolitical Simulator 4, the hyperrealistic simulator of today's world! In Power & Revolution 2019 Edition, play as the Head of State and extend your influence around the globe. By playing as several countries, try to change the destiny of our planet with orchestrated actions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 Processor: 1.6 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX 9.0-compatible video card Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 Processor: 2 Ghz , multi-core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 3D Video card with 512 mb or more of dedicated VRAM
